summary: **Red Dead Redemption 2** is a popular video game released in 2018. It's about a criminal named Arthur Morgan in the Wild West in 1899. You can explore a huge world, have shootouts, hunt, and ride horses. The game looks very realistic and took a long time to make. It's very successful, winning many awards and selling millions of copies. People love the story, characters, and detailed world. It's available on PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Windows, and Stadia.
title: Red Dead Redemption 2
